physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Stable condition with dry mucous membranes and skin.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Progressive reduction of consciousness leading to a comatose state.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Laboratory tests showed mild normochromic, microcytic anemia (hemoglobin 110 g/L), hyponatremia, and persistent hypokalemia.
Endoscopy and colonoscopy showed villous atrophy of the duodenum and ileum, glandular atrophy and interstitial edema of the colon.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Clinical symptoms improved and remission of diarrhea followed treatment with budesonide and a gluten-free diet.
